Name: Potioneer: The VR Gardening Simulator
About the game: Plant, nurture, and grow your garden in VR with Potioneer! Craft a home with your own two hands by hammering wood and nails! Express your creativity! Moving forward in Early Access, explore the countryside to discover new flora and collect valuable trinkets. Combine harvested materials into potions for special effects!
